column5: Can anyone tell me the best place around the GTA to pick up replacement parts or have repairs done on a Big Jon manual rigger?I'll post a pic of what I messed up later tonight - broke the end off the clutch assembly. Hope it can be fixed or else I now have a pile of spare parts. Pic had been added.   ThanksPete
Pete, the Big Jon website has alot of spare parts listed...
Yeah I tried that... The clutch discs are there but not the rod that they go on. I think it may be a goner - let me get that pic up to show what happened.
Hey Pete I think tightlines  in Pickering still carries big Jon ?? Try them I'm not 100% sure ??? Give it a shot
call shortwave in port credit  they found a motor for my 70's big jon's.  i'm very confident if anyone in canada has what you need - its them!

fishindevil & Steve - thanks for the suggestions, I will try them.  I managed to remove the broken part from the tower - hopefully it is still available somewhere. I still don't understand how those clutch washers are to be removed though...    Pete
